name: Puffer Clicks
description:
Puffer Clicks is a cute game where you feed and take care of your adorable little PufferFish but watch out! Some of the other fishies do not like PufferFish eating all of the food!

LDJAM41 entry for the theme Combine 2 Incompatible Genres. Combining clicker/idle genre and action/shooting, and  a little bit of resource-hoarding ;).
